# Improved Deathcounter
 This Action alows you to add a death counter to any of the games you play.

## Import Code
+ Copy This Code.
```text

```

## Installation
In Streamer.bot in select `Import` from the top left.
Copy the `Import Code` and paste it into the `Import String`. 
+ Example:
+ ![Import](Images/Import.png)

+ You should now have 5 new actions.
+ Example:
+ ![List-of-imported-Actions](Images/List-of-imported-Actions.png "List-of-imported-Actions")

+ You should now have 5 new commands.
+ Example:
+ ![List-of-imported-Commands](Images/List-of-imported-Commands.png "List-of-imported-Commands")

## Subaction Setup
Change the OBS GDI Text to your Deathcounters Text.
+ Example:
+ ![Setup](Images/Setup.png "Setup")

## Example Usage
+ You can now bind these actions to Hot-Keys, Commands or Streamdeck Buttons.
+ Example:
+ ![Example](Images/Example.png "Example")
